page.title: 14VILLAGE LIFE POEM.
page.content: Sheep munching away,flowers in the way. Lovely and hot, and lovely as well.People biking,people tidying. Chestnut trees and dead leaves. Old people moaning and us lot groaning. Gardens neat and birds tweet tweet. Butterflies fly and flowers die. In the graves it's spooky, black clouds coming over. All of a sudden the sun comes out. A few cars go past, dead leaves on the grass . Chairs to sit on, people chatting. Lots of roads and grass too. Church bells ringing,willow trees weeping. The sheep have been shorn. Egg shells are on the grass. It is quiet. Though there are lots of houses.
